title: Evolution Of Cardiovascular Risk Prediction Algorithms
content: Risk prediction algorithms have evolved since Framingham to account for key risk factors and social determinants of health.

title: Advancement Of High-Throughput Sequencing (Hts)
content: Revolutionary publications pave the way for polygenic risk scores and targeted therapy developments like PCSK9i and APOCIII.

title: Development Of High Blood Pressure Standards & Treatments
content: Build and Blood Pressure Studies demonstrated increase in mortality associated with incremental increase in systolic and diastolic blood pressures.

title: Development Of High Blood Pressure Standards & Treatments
content: Veterans Administration Cooperative Studies show evidence for the beneficial impact of lowering blood pressure with antihypertensive agents.

title: Development Of High Blood Pressure Standards & Treatments
content: NHLBI Hypertension Task Force formed to improve blood pressure control and treatment in the US.

title: Development Of High Blood Pressure Standards & Treatments
content: Framingham Heart Study observes increments in systolic or diastolic blood pressure associated with increases in mortality.
